entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Blind River
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of drizzle. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
